character.age: 22 years young with an ageless spirit
character.role: Wanderer, Mage, and Guardian of the Realm
character.background: Born in the mystical forest of Elvendom, Eira was raised by a family of skilled mages and warriors. She has traveled extensively across the realms, studying ancient arts and mastering elemental magic.

physical_appearance.hair_color: Silver-White with subtle hints of lavender
